trans-unit.source: Signing in using an alternate method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in using an alternate method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page will describe how a user can signin using an alternate method with Azure MFA.
trans-unit.target: This page will describe how a user can signin using an alternate method with Azure MFA.

trans-unit.source: Signing in using an alternate method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in using an alternate method with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: The following section will show you how to sign in with an alternate method when your primary method may not be available.
trans-unit.target: The following section will show you how to sign in with an alternate method when your primary method may not be available.

trans-unit.source: To sign in with an alternate method
trans-unit.target: To sign in with an alternate method

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Select use a different verification option.You will be present with a choice of different options.The number you see will be based on how many you have setup.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Select use a different verification option.You will be present with a choice of different options.The number you see will be based on how many you have setup.<html></html>

trans-unit.source: <html></html>Choose an alternate method and sign in.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>Choose an alternate method and sign in.<html></html>
